subject: Re: making my own box
author: Tom
full_text:
Hey Mark that would be great if you could send those to me. Ive got 
some electronics experience repairing coin op video machines and have 
done a bit of work on the i.c. boards themselves.

Tom
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "mwaldenberger" <ghosthunter01@...> 
wrote:
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Tom" <dodak1967@> wrote:
> >
> > Could anybody help?
> > 
> > Beyond modifying a radio or other piece of electronics I want to 
> > assemble a box from scratch. However I am in need of some 
> schematics. 
> > Where could I find those?
> > 
> > Tom in WIsconsin
> >
> Hey Tom,
> I'm new here so I just saw your message. I have downloaded several 
> schematics from the internet for different versions of the box as I 
> could find them. If you want me to send them along to you, drop me 
a 
> line. Like you, I want to build one but I lack the expertise and 
> knowledge when it comes to electronics so not only do I have to 
find 
> the right box to build, but also someone to help me out with 
> constructing it as well. 
> I have a group here in the La Crosse area but both of my techs left 
> to start their own group with some of our other members. So much 
for 
> my tech department. Anyway, let me know if you want me to send them 
> along to you. They are all in pdf format. Take care and we'll talk 
> with you again soon.
> 
> Mark Waldenberger
>
